<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Consume Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1827) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=633)

</column>

---

When you successfully [Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=633) a spell of the tradition that matches your bloodline, you consume it, replenishing yourself with its energy. When you do, you are nourished as if you had eaten a meal and regain Hit Points equal to twice the level of the counteracted spell.
name: Consume Spell
